G

GeneralUser - Class in Unnamed Package
The GeneralUser class represents a user who can add items to their shopping cart, view their cart, and manage the contents of their cart.

generateOTP() - Method in class AccountsManager
This Java function generates a 6-digit random OTP (one-time password) using numbers 0-9.
